title: TextUtils
description: A React based text utility application to manipulate text such as uppercase, lowercase, word count, character count and dark mode support.

title: iNotebook
description: A full stack MERN notes application with user authentication, CRUD operations and CRUD features using MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js.

title: NewsApp
description: A React news application that fetches live news using API and displays category wise news with a clean user interface.

title: JavaScript Date & Time App
description: A JavaScript application that shows real-time date, time and day using JavaScript Date object.
